name: été
description:
Summer is blooming as you wander into Montreal with Marianne, an ambitious young filmmaker, and Théo, a charming and talented musician.

But your adventures together are bound to end with the season. How will you remember these fleeting moments? What will you choose to forget?

Fill a blank canvas with vivid colors as you discover living vignettes of the city through ink, music and photographs.

Explore a maze of intimate moments by using memory itself to navigate the world.Key Features

  • Free painting: Use gorgeous watercolour to paint the canvas around you and reveal the secrets of the world.
  • Explore memories: Roam freely through immersive, open city scenes and unlock buried parts of your memory.
  • Photo album: Capture your favorite moments of the summer on film to relive them later.
  • Interactive music: Lead a symphony of sounds and instruments that play as you interact with the world around you.
  • Personal story: Befriend two unique characters as you take part in a touching story about art and ambition.
  • Unique setting: Travel to Montreal's bustling alleyways, parks and neighbourhoods with authentic French voice acting.
  • Not a game: No combat, no puzzle, no difficulty, no failure. Experience the story and paint the world at your own pace.
